column3:
Nice Work!
IMO relatively important PR to reduce p2p "noise".
Concept ACK. Short code review.
Any volunteer to write some test cases?\n

What will we do when we sent `feefilter` to the peer and the peer sends us zero fee `inv`s?

In the DIP draft, you wrote:

> Upon receipt of a "feefilter" message, the node will be permitted, but not required, to filter transaction invs for transactions that fall below the feerate provided in the feefilter message interpreted as satoshis per kilobyte.

Is this what we want? Why should a prot
Squashed and rebased\n
Please mention the bip number in the github subject line. Also you'd need to update `/doc/bips.md` prior to merge.\n
Concept ACK  ef3b850\n
@MarcoFalke OK I made your suggested change\n
ACK\n
ACK\n
Squashed 1 commit and rebased to address merge conflict (trivial)\n
utACK 0371797\n
Nit: indent.\n
To unlock the thread-lock for the LogPrint at L5174.\n
We want don't want?\n
SPC at the end missing\n
SPC at the end of comment\n
@luke-jr Can you please assign a BIP number?\n
I remember adding the clang-format script some time ago. Something like `git diff -U0 HEAD~1.. | ./contrib/devtools/clang-format-diff.py -p1 -i -v` should do all of this.\n
@morcos needs to request this.\n
its -> it is/it's\n
This have been merged now - can you please rebase?\n
Nit: I am pretty sure this goes up to "Notable changes" (`Example item`) as this place down here is usually used for the detailed change log only.\n
Nit: can you add the missing ampersand to `CAmount nAbsurdFee` as well here?\n

`CAmount fee` implies an absolute fee. Maybe `CAmount feeRate`?

Personally, I'd prefer to use `CFeeRate` in places except `CNode`. I.e. something like this should suffice:

``` diff
diff --git a/src/main.cpp b/src/main.cpp
index 487564a..c0fccbf 100644
--- a/src/main.cpp
+++ b/src/main.cpp
@@ -944 +944 @@ bool AcceptToMemoryPoolWorker(CTxMemPool& pool, CValidationState& state, const C
-
@MarcoFalke I wasn't sure about that.\nI didn't love the idea of introducing CFeeRate into net.cpp and RelayTransaction, but if people prefer it that way I don't have a strong opinion.\n

I mostly care about having it in the mempool, so the code can be reused by other logic than just feefilter.

Thanks for addressing the nits.
tiny nit: Add missing ampersand to `CAmount nAbsurdFee`?\n
Needs merge conflict resolved.\n
why not use nNow variable which is also set to GetTimeMicros() earlier in this function?
